name: Neon Blocks 2021
description:
【Game Introduction】
Neon Blocks is a retro bar-style block game. This game not only allows you to enjoy visually, but also exercises your brain so that you can find the best solution, challenge your puzzle skills, and see if you can How many points to get.

【Game Features】
Easy to learn match-3 puzzle game, allowing you to play for several hours! Drag and drop puzzle pieces onto the board, aiming to merge 3 or more sets of puzzles of the same color. Merge the three to clear the puzzle pieces and make room for the new puzzle. The more times you clear at one time, the higher the score will be. How many color blocks can you connect?
